scripts.test:local: cross-env RUN_ENV=local ENABLE_TRACE=false ENABLE_VIDEO=false npm run cucumber
scripts.test:allure: cross-env RUN_ENV=local cucumber-js --require-module ts-node/register --require src/steps/**/*.ts --require src/support/hook.ts --format allure-cucumberjs --format json:reports/cucumber-report.json --format progress --format-options "{ \"allure-cucumberjs\": { \"resultDir\": \"allure-results\" } }" features
scripts.test:regression: cross-env RUN_ENV=local ENABLE_TRACE=false ENABLE_VIDEO=false npx cucumber-js --require-module ts-node/register --require src/steps/**/*.ts --require src/support/hook.ts --tags '@regression' features
scripts.cucumber: npx cucumber-js --require-module ts-node/register --require src/steps/**/*.ts --require src/support/hook.ts features
scripts.bs:cucumber: browserstack-node-sdk cucumber-js --require-module ts-node/register --require src/steps/**/*.ts --require src/support/hook.ts features
scripts.report:allure: npx allure generate allure-results --clean -o allure-report && npx allure open allure-report
